message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm asking for $18,000 for it.  What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $18,000 represents the true value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $15,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $15,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
